p: The right testis was fixed in 10% neutral buffered formalin over 24 hours. The tissues were then processed with 70-100% ethanol and xylene, respectively. The infiltrated tissues were embedded in paraffin blocks and cut at 2 μm by using semiautomatic microtome (Leica, Germany). All slides were stained with hematoxylin and eosin (H&E), and histological changes were observed by light microscopy.
